Uses of Interface
jyVis.widgets.JLWidget

Packages that use JLWidget
jyVis.widgets Contains the JyVis widget UI framework. 
 

Uses of JLWidget in jyVis.widgets
 

Classes in jyVis.widgets that implement JLWidget
 class JLCheckBox
          A check box JLWidget, inherits from JCheckBox.
 class JLColorChooserButton
          A colored button which prompts the user to select a color when clicked.
 class JLColorMapEditorPanel
          A panel which displays a ColorMap and provides user interaction for editing it.
 class JLComboBox
          A combo box selector JLWidget, inherits from JComboBox.
 class JLInternalFrame
          A session scripting enabled JInternalFrame
 class JLListEditor
           
 class JLShapeMapEditorPanel
          A panel which displays a ShapeMap and provides user interaction for editing it.
 class JLTextField
          A text field JLWidget, inherits from JTextField.
 

Methods in jyVis.widgets with parameters of type JLWidget
static void JLPeriodicUpdateThread.setupJLWidget(JLWidget<?> widget)
          Sets up a JLWidget so that periodically, its internal and external states are checked for consistency, and if they are different, out of synch, then the external is set to match the internal.
